form.label: Data Model TSTATS Review
form.description: Proof-of-concept base searches for an accelerated (tstats) CIM validation approach. For now this is more of a data browser, but could be useful as-is for just browsing accelerated models.

search.query: | rest /servicesNS/-/-/datamodel/model | search NOT disabled=1 | spath output=accel input=acceleration path=enabled | search accel!=false | eval description=mvfilter(match(description, "^\{")) | spath input=description output=outputFields path=objects{}.fields{} | rename displayName AS dm_model, eai:acl.app as app | table dm_model, displayName, title, app, outputFields | streamstats count as groupid | mvexpand outputFields | spath input=outputFields | where type!="objectCount" | where !match(owner, "^Untagged_.*") | where fieldName!="_time" | eval short_name=fieldName | eval dm_name=case(owner="BaseEvent" or owner="root", fieldName, 0==0, owner.".".fieldName) | table app, dm_model, title, dm_name, short_name, groupid, owner | eval stats_expr="values(". dm_name .") as ". short_name | stats values(title) as title, values(app) as app, values(dm_model) as dm_model values(stats_expr) as stats_expr, by groupid, owner | eval name=dm_model . " (".owner.")" | eval tstats_fields=mvjoin(stats_expr, ", ") | eval da_search="| tstats summariesonly=t count as events, " . tstats_fields . " from datamodel=" . title . " where nodename=" . owner
